extendedInfo.description: "The classic flashlight" is an easy and convenient mobile application with which you can illuminate what you want with your phone. Have two Link Buttons, the button "Flash" with which you can keep the lights on while holding the button, and the button on / off with the light that will keep fixed or off.The flashlight will serve you for any occasions, these times these dark and need to find an object in the dark with your friends at night to illuminate while playing, or to read when you're in bed.You can give all the uses you can imagine, is always useful to have an application of this type in your cell, you never know when it might be useful!tags: flashlight, spotlight, torch light, lantern, torch, headlight, lamp
